In England, in the seven days to 30 December, there were 898,059 new confirmed cases (1,588.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 December, there were 689,432 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 30% (208,627 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 January is 11,557,285 (20,437.2 cases per 100,000 population).
